p: Huang and collaborators [ 57] used the functionalized imidazolium IL 1-hydropropyl-3-methylimidazolium tetrafluoroborate, [C 3OHmim][BF 4], for the detection of H 2S. Due to the high absolute values of potential needed to oxidize or reduce H 2S, monoethanolamine (MEA) was added to facilitate its detection ( Figure 11).
